Ironman Journal

Follow my journey of transformation, one milestone at a time.

5th June 2025

Started Training

The first step on a long road. The journey to Ironman begins.

1st July 2025

First 10K Run Without Break

A huge mental and physical milestone. Proved to myself I can push through the wall.

20th July 2025

Longest Ride – 50 km

Pushing the limits on two wheels. The endurance is building, one kilometer at a time.

5th August 2025

First Mental Burnout – Bounced Back with Meditation

A reminder that recovery is just as important as training. Used meditation to find balance and get back on track.
